alert.note: Alert for Central Chippewa; Eastern Mackinac; Mackinac Island, Bois Blanc Island; Southeast Chippewa; Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 30 at 2:47PM EDT until April 01 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 13 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Eastern Upper Michigan. * WHEN...From late Friday night through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
